clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used for the treatment of hypertension and heart failure A20319

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Fimasartan is a selective angiotensin receptor 1 AR1 inhibitor A20319 It acts to lower blood pressure by inhibiting vasoconstriction

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of orthostatic hypotension and syncope can be increased when Fimasartan is combined with Duloxetine
The risk or severity of hypotension and orthostatic hypotension can be increased when Fimasartan is combined with Levodopa
